ai-mil3.6.3:1.2_0: “Venerable Sir, with the thirty-two marks of a great man, he has the thirty-two marks of a golden bowl with gold coin and bullion. ”
ai-mil3.6.3:1.3_0: “Yes, great king, the Buddha has the thirty-two marks of a great man, possessed the thirty-two marks of a golden garland. ”
ai-mil3.6.3:2.1_0: “But sir, what does the thirty-two marks that he possesses the thirty-two marks?”
ai-mil3.6.3:2.2_0: “Great king, the thirty-two marks have the thirty-two marks. We will disparage the thirty-two marks of a golden coin.”
ai-mil3.6.3:3.1_0: “In that case, sir, a Buddha has the thirty-two marks of a great man, of all they possessed of gold coins or bull elephants, horses, and chariots, or their fathers. They are referred to assemble, and their fathers.”
ai-mil3.6.3:3.3_0: “But great king, is there a hundred spending in whatever way?”
ai-mil3.6.3:3.7_0: “Great king, what’s the colour or scent?”
ai-mil3.6.3:3.9_0: “Then who do you think or smells with water?”
ai-mil3.6.3:3.11_0: “In the same way, great king, the Buddha has the thirty-two marks of a great man, possessed the thirty-two marks, gold coins, and silver, gold. He was old, them with gold adornments and banners, covered with gold netting. It was resplendent, and declared by the thirty carts.”
ai-mil3.6.3:5.1_0: The third marks of a great man.
